shipping_free: For orders over €150, shipping is free.
shipping_time: Orders are shipped within 1-2 business days.
jewelry_art_desc1: At Pnoi, every piece of jewelry is a unique expression of art and elegance. We combine traditional techniques with modern design to create pieces that stand out.
jewelry_art_desc2: Each creation is made with attention to detail, using only the finest materials to ensure quality and durability.
collections_intro: Explore our collection of unique rings, bracelets, necklaces, and earrings. Find the perfect piece for yourself or as a gift for your loved ones.
no_products_found: No products found matching your criteria.
returns_intro: Everything you need to know about returns and exchanges.
returns_p1: Any product return is accepted only if the product is returned within 15 days from the date of receipt, in its original condition, unused, undamaged, unsoiled, and accompanied by any documents sent (receipt, certificate, etc). No return is accepted without prior arrangement.
returns_p2: To return products, contact us via the site, informing us about the product you wish to return, the reason for the return, the date of receipt, and your details. We will proceed with the process according to the reason for return. The return shipping cost is borne by you, and you may request a replacement or a refund within 15 days. Shipping or COD fees are not refunded. We recommend returning the product via registered mail to avoid theft, damage, or loss.
returns_p3: If the product delivered is incorrect (not the product you ordered), the return will be made at our expense, and you may request a refund (including shipping/COD fees) or the correct product. Refund or replacement will occur after we receive and verify the incorrect product.
returns_p4: If the product is defective upon receipt, you have 3 days to contact us for a replacement. After three days, no replacement or refund is provided.
terms_intro: The terms of use of our online store.
terms_section1_p1: The website pnoikosmima.com is owned by the company 'PNOI handmade jewelry', based in Kypseli, Ioannou Drosopoulou 63, VAT 129517325, email pnoi@yahoo.gr.
terms_section1_p2: Users are provided access to our product catalog. The user is responsible for access, viewing content freely. Use of this website constitutes explicit and unconditional acceptance of the terms of use and content (hereinafter Terms of Use).
terms_section1_p3: Please ensure you agree with the following terms and conditions, as further use of our website implies your explicit and unconditional acceptance.
terms_section2_p1: We reserve the right to unilaterally modify or update these terms. Any changes to our privacy policy will be posted on our website. Please check for changes before each use.
terms_section2_p2: pnoikosmima.com is not responsible for technical or typographical errors that cannot be foreseen or have occurred unintentionally or due to interruptions or force majeure.
terms_section2_p3: We cannot guarantee uninterrupted and error-free operation of the website.
terms_section3_p1: Images, logos, graphics, photos, texts, etc. are our intellectual property and are protected by Greek law and international conventions. Some products or services mentioned on pnoikosmima.com bearing the trademarks of their respective companies or organizations are their own intellectual and industrial property.
terms_section3_p2: Any copying, analog/digital recording, mechanical reproduction, download, modification, resale, creation of derivative works, or misleading the public about the real provider is prohibited.
terms_section4_p1: Respecting your privacy, we have taken measures to ensure and protect your data.
terms_section4_p2: Our website is governed by security measures for data transfer and protection from loss, misuse, or alteration.
terms_section4_p3: Your personal data will not be disclosed to third parties unless authorized by you or required by law, court order, or public authority.
terms_section5_p1: When filling out the order form and submitting it to us, you are asked for personal data (e.g., name, address, contact details, etc.). You provide this data voluntarily as part of your registration, having read and unconditionally accepted the content and terms of use of this website, and with your explicit consent that this data may be processed as needed until you revoke your consent, in accordance with applicable laws.
bracelet_description: Handmade bracelet in 925 silver, with oxidized patina. The combination of ethnic design with a modern approach is the perfect match for those who love to wear unique, standout jewelry. Each piece is handmade, so no two are exactly alike. The bracelet bears a 925 stamp, our workshop logo, and a certificate of authenticity.
shipping_intro: Everything you need to know about shipping methods and costs.
shipping_boxnow_desc: Orders are shipped via Box Now courier service within 1-2 business days. Shipping cost is €2.
shipping_geniki_desc: Orders are shipped via Geniki Taxydromiki courier service within 1-2 business days. Shipping cost is €10.
shipping_free_notice: For all shipping methods, orders over €150 qualify for free shipping.
bracelet_desc_detail: A unique handmade bracelet crafted from 925 silver, blending ethnic and modern design. Perfect for any style.
payments_methods_intro: Select your preferred payment method for your order.
payments_card_desc: You can pay for your order using a credit or debit card: Visa, MasterCard, Maestro, Diners Club, and Discover.
payments_security_desc: All card payments are processed securely via the Nexi E-Commerce platform of Nexi Payments Greece S.A. and use TLS 1.2 encryption protocol with 128-bit Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption. Encryption is a way of encoding information until it reaches its designated recipient, who can decode it using the appropriate key.
payments_paypal_desc: You can pay for your order securely using your PayPal account through the PayPal payment environment.
payments_bank_desc: You can pay for your order by depositing the amount into the following bank account:
payments_bank_notice: (!) The bank transfer must be completed within 24 hours of placing your order. The deposit slip must be sent by email to pnoi3@yahoo.gr. If payment is not made within 24 hours, the order will be automatically canceled without notice.
privacy_policy_intro: Protecting your personal data is important to us. Read how we handle your data.
about_values_subtitle: What guides us in creating every piece of jewelry
about_value_quality_desc: We use only the best materials and techniques for every creation.
about_value_passion_desc: Every piece is made with love and attention to detail.
about_value_excellence_desc: We strive for perfection in every aspect of our work.
about_value_service_desc: Our customers are at the center of everything we do.
about_cta_title: Ready to create something unique together?
about_cta_desc: Contact us to discuss your ideas and create the perfect piece for you.
about_intro: Our story, our values, and our passion for handmade jewelry.
contact_intro: Feel free to contact us. We are happy to help you with any question about our jewelry.
our_story_text:
For over 15 years, PNOI has been full of endless moments and memories. Our love for jewelry, especially handmade, is the reason we decided to create our workshop.
Choosing the name was easy. We grew up in Kypseli, a neighborhood surrounded by wonderful architectural achievements and reflecting a pure urban community. We wanted to highlight this, with a fresh air, a new breath, but keeping the area's nobility.
We focus on the meaning of handmade, highlighting the imperfection that hands give, but also pay great attention to our materials. That's why we chose 925 silver & semi-precious stones for our products. We also want to have a wide variety of styles as the PNOI community expresses its diversity with many options, new techniques, colors, and designs, while maintaining the high quality of our products.
Follow us and enjoy the journey.
